Controlling Folder Selection

When you click a new component tab in the upper right pane, StarTeam gives you the option of retaining the folder currently selected from the folder hierarchy or replacing it with the root folder.

To control the folder that displays after a tab change:

  1. Select Tools > Personal Options from the menu bar. The Personal Options dialog opens.

  2. Select the Workspace tab.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Select the Restore folder selection on tab change check box to retain the currently selected folder when the component tab changes.

    • Clear this check box to select the root folder every time the component tab changes.

  4. Click OK.
